name: Show current status and last error
Exit Heimdall
template:
UPDATE heimdall.tblcommand 
SET activated = 1 
WHERE Command = 'Exit'

template:

Where id = 2

name: Exit Heimdall
template:
UPDATE heimdall.tblcommand 
SET activated = 1 
WHERE Command = 'ToonActWaarde'

name: Exit Heimdall
template:
UPDATE heimdall.tblcommand 
SET activated = 0 
WHERE Command = 'ToonActWaarde'
